data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
In compliance with Regulations 30 and 46 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations
and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform that the Company had Earnings
Conference Call with several Analysts and other investors on the Un-audited Financial Results of the
Company for the quarter ended December 31 2025 (Financial Results) on 9th February 2026. Mr. Chirag
Patel Joint Managing Director Mr. Malav Patel Joint Managing Director Mr. Sanjay Majmudar Director
and Mr. Keyur Shah Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company represented the Company at the said
Earnings Conference Call.
The audio recording of said Earnings Conference Call of the Company is available on the website of the
Company and can be accessed at the weblink: https://www.mbel.in/investors

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of M & B Engineering Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 06 2025 the equity shares of M & B Engineering Ltd (Scrip Code: 544470) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250805- dated August 05 2025.
